name: Deactivate Kyle
description:
A small platforming game that I developed through my game dev journey. Help Iris deactivate the evil AI robot, Kyle, that is causing mayhem. Collect the Seven key in both level to unlock the laser gates and access Kyle. I tried my best balacing the levels but I think that in the end I created something for the Super Meat Boy lover.

Have fun and feel free to leave a comment :)
